Package pbxuniverse

package pbxuniverse
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    ExpanderVerse
    Control addressable LED displays from your computer.
    PBXBoard
    Settings, data and utilities for individual Pixelblaze Output Expander (PBX) boards.
    PBXChannel
    Top level container class for all Pixelblaze Output Expander (PBX) channels.
    PBXChannelAPA102
    Holds settings and data for APA102-type channels Dotstar/SK9822/APA102 LEDs require that one output channel on the expander board be set up as a dedicated clock channel.
    PBXChannelAPAClock
    Holds settings APA102 clock channels APA102 LEDs require that one output channel on the expander board be set up as a dedicated clock channel.
    PBXChannelWS2812
    Holds settings and data for WS2812 output channels
    PBXDataChannel
    Container class for all Pixelblaze Output Expander (PBX) data channels, including channels for all LED types and clock data.
    PBXPixel
    ExpanderVerse pixel data type.
    PBXSerial
    ExpanderVerse serial port object.
    PBXTools
    Static utility methods for working with LEDs, drawn from Pixelblaze, FASTLed and other places.
  • Enum Summary
    Enum
    Description
    ChannelType
    Channel types which can be used with addChannel to create LED channels.
    DrawMode
    Supported LED pixel drawing modes.
